title: Bug 6304 - Unable to Synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails to execute successfully.
EB: The synchronization process should seamlessly handle the simultaneous synchronization of a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file. Users expect synchronization to be reliable and error-free in this scenario.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) within the same package.
3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files.
